credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Five Figures from Parnassus by Raphael Sanzio
medium: Pen and ink, brush and sepia wash over black chalk on laid paper
description: Seated boy, head and part of right leg shown. Drawn twofold. Two poets at right of Homer and half-figure shown  next to standing Muses, which are at left of Apollo.
name: Drawing
